subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce scored 5 of his 20 points in overtime, and the Washington Wizards beat the Toronto Raptors on Saturday in Game 1 of their first-round playoff series.
snippet: Paul Pierce scored 5 of his 20 points in overtime, and the Washington Wizards beat the Toronto Raptors on Saturday in Game 1 of their first-round playoff series.
